name: atlassian-tools
description: Manage Jira issues and Confluence pages with integrated UI, YAML editing, and Copilot chat support

languageModelTools.name: getJiraIssue
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get details for a specific Jira issue by key. Returns summary, description, status, priority, assignee, reporter, and dates.

languageModelTools.name: searchJiraIssues
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Search for Jira issues using JQL (Jira Query Language). Example: 'project = project_name AND status = "In Progress"'.

languageModelTools.name: getJiraIssueLinks
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get all linked issues (blocks, is blocked by, relates to, etc.) for a Jira ticket.

languageModelTools.name: gatherJiraIssueContext
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Gather comprehensive context for a Jira issue: main issue, sub-tasks, and linked issues. Useful for understanding full scope.

languageModelTools.name: createJiraComment
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Add a comment to a Jira issue. Use this to document findings or link to Confluence pages.

comment.description: Comment text (supports Atlassian Document Format or plain text)

languageModelTools.name: addJiraWorklog
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Log time spent on a Jira issue. Provide time in format like '3h 30m', '2d 4h', '1w 2d'.

started.description: ISO 8601 date-time when work started (optional, defaults to now)

comment.description: Optional comment for the worklog entry

languageModelTools.name: getJiraWorklogs
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get all time tracking worklogs for a Jira issue. Returns time spent, dates, and comments.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of worklogs to return (default: 1000)

languageModelTools.name: getJiraChangelog
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get change history for a Jira issue. Shows who changed what fields and when.

languageModelTools.name: bulkFetchJiraIssues
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Fetch multiple Jira issues by keys in a single request. More efficient than multiple getIssue calls.

issueKeys.description: Array of issue keys to fetch

languageModelTools.name: getJiraCreateMetadata
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get metadata for creating issues in projects (available fields, issue types, validation rules). Essential for dynamic issue creation forms.

projectKeys.description: Optional project keys to get metadata for

issueTypeNames.description: Optional issue type names to filter

languageModelTools.name: findJiraAssignableUsers
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Search for users who can be assigned to issues. Use for user picker/autocomplete functionality.

project.description: Optional project key to scope the search

issueKey.description: Optional issue key to scope the search

maxResults.description: Maximum number of users to return (default: 50)

languageModelTools.name: getJiraComments
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get all comments for a Jira issue. Returns comment text, authors, and timestamps.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of comments to return (default: 50)

languageModelTools.name: createJiraIssueLink
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Create a link between two Jira issues. Link types include 'Blocks', 'Relates', 'Duplicates', etc.

inwardIssue.description: The inward issue key (e.g., for 'Blocks', this is the blocked issue)

outwardIssue.description: The outward issue key (e.g., for 'Blocks', this is the blocking issue)

languageModelTools.name: getJiraWatchers
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get list of users watching a Jira issue (receiving notifications).

languageModelTools.name: addJiraWatcher
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Add a user as a watcher to a Jira issue (they will receive notifications).

accountId.description: The Atlassian account ID of the user to add as watcher

languageModelTools.name: searchConfluencePages
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Search for Confluence pages using CQL (Confluence Query Language). Example: 'type = page AND title ~ "Test Plan"'.

languageModelTools.name: getConfluencePage
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get a specific Confluence page by ID. Returns title, content, version, and space info.

languageModelTools.name: createConfluencePage
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Create a new Confluence page. Provide space key, title, content (HTML storage format), and optional parent page ID.

content.description: Page content in Confluence storage format (HTML)

languageModelTools.name: updateConfluencePage
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Update an existing Confluence page. Provide page ID, new title, and new content. The version is optional and will be auto-fetched if not provided or if there's a version conflict.

content.description: New page content in Confluence storage format (HTML)

version.description: Optional: Current version number (will be auto-fetched if omitted or stale)

languageModelTools.name: searchConfluenceByJiraKey
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Search Confluence pages that mention a specific Jira ticket key. Useful for finding test plans, documentation, and related pages.

jiraKey.description: The Jira issue key to search for

languageModelTools.name: getConfluencePageComments
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get all comments for a Confluence page. Returns comment text, authors, and timestamps.

depth.description: Optional depth filter (e.g., 'all' or a number)

languageModelTools.name: deleteConfluencePage
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Delete a Confluence page by ID. This action cannot be undone.

pageId.description: The Confluence page ID to delete

languageModelTools.name: createJiraIssue
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Create a new Jira issue. Provide project key, summary, issue type (default: Task), and optional description.

projectKey.description: The project key where the issue will be created

languageModelTools.name: updateJiraIssue
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Update fields of an existing Jira issue. Provide issue key and fields object with field names and values to update.

fields.description: Object containing field names and values to update

languageModelTools.name: getJiraTransitions
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get available transitions (status changes) for a Jira issue. Use this before transitioning an issue to find valid transition IDs.

languageModelTools.name: transitionJiraIssue
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Change the status of a Jira issue by transitioning it. Use getJiraTransitions first to get valid transition IDs.

languageModelTools.name: getJiraProject
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get details about a Jira project including components, versions, issue types, and roles.

languageModelTools.name: assignJiraIssue
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Assign a Jira issue to a user by account ID. Set accountId to null to unassign.

accountId.description: The Atlassian account ID of the user to assign (null to unassign)

languageModelTools.name: deleteJiraIssue
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Delete a Jira issue. Optionally delete all subtasks. This action cannot be undone.

issueKey.description: The Jira issue key to delete

languageModelTools.name: getJiraAttachments
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get all attachments for a Jira issue. Returns attachment metadata including filename, size, and download URL.

languageModelTools.name: getJiraVotes
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get vote information for a Jira issue including vote count and voters.

languageModelTools.name: getProjectVersions
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get all versions (releases) for a Jira project. Useful for release planning and tracking.

languageModelTools.name: getVersionProgress
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get detailed progress information for a specific version including done, in-progress, and to-do issue counts.

languageModelTools.name: getProjectEpics
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get all epics in a Jira project. Epics are large bodies of work that can be broken down into smaller stories.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of epics to return (default: 50)

languageModelTools.name: getEpicProgress
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get detailed progress for a specific epic including all child issues and completion percentage. Essential for tracking epic delivery.

languageModelTools.name: getProjectSummary
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get comprehensive project overview including total issues, progress metrics, breakdown by type and priority, and recent activity. Perfect for status reports and dashboards.

languageModelTools.name: getEpicsProgress
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get progress information for all epics in a project. Shows completion percentage for each epic - ideal for high-level project tracking and roadmap status.

languageModelTools.name: getProjectComponents
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get all components for a Jira project. Components are subsections of a project used to group issues.

languageModelTools.name: getProjectStatuses
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get all available statuses for a Jira project including workflow information.

languageModelTools.name: createConfluenceFooterComment
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Create a footer comment on a Confluence page or reply to an existing comment. Uses Confluence v2 API.

parentCommentId.description: Optional parent comment ID to create a reply

languageModelTools.name: updateConfluenceFooterComment
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Update an existing footer comment. Uses Confluence v2 API.

body.description: New comment body content (HTML storage format)

version.description: Current version number of the comment

languageModelTools.name: deleteConfluenceFooterComment
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Delete a footer comment. Uses Confluence v2 API.

languageModelTools.name: getConfluenceFooterComment
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get a specific footer comment by ID. Uses Confluence v2 API.

languageModelTools.name: resolveConfluenceInlineComment
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Resolve an inline comment by setting its resolution status to 'resolved'. Uses Confluence v2 API.

version.description: Current version number of the comment

languageModelTools.name: reopenConfluenceInlineComment
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Reopen a resolved inline comment by setting its resolution status to 'reopened'. Uses Confluence v2 API.

version.description: Current version number of the comment

languageModelTools.name: getConfluenceInlineComment
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get a specific inline comment by ID including its resolution status. Uses Confluence v2 API.

languageModelTools.name: getConfluencePageFooterComments
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get all footer comments for a Confluence page. Uses Confluence v2 API for better performance.

limit.description: Maximum number of comments to return (default: 25)

languageModelTools.name: getConfluencePageInlineComments
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get all inline comments for a Confluence page with resolution status. Uses Confluence v2 API for better performance.

limit.description: Maximum number of comments to return (default: 25)
